reference.shortdesc: Gets the original API payload for the assembly XSLT action.

section.title: Guidelines
section.p: The apim:get-original-payload extension function gets the original API payload for the assembly XSLT action. The original payload must be XML and parsed by a parse action first. Otherwise, this function returns empty.

section.title: Results
section.p: An XML document that contains the original payload. Returns empty when the original payload is not XML or not parsed by a parse action.

example.title: Example
example.p: Transform the original payload to update the current payload.
